property.name: tez.lib.uris
property.description: Comma-delimited list of the location of the Tez libraries which will be localized for DAGs.

property.name: tez.use.cluster.hadoop-libs
property.description: Use Hadoop libraries provided by cluster instead of those packaged with Tez

property.name: tez.am.resource.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to be used by the AppMaster

property.name: tez.am.java.opts
property.description: Java opts for the Tez AppMaster process

property.name: tez.task.resource.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to be used by tasks

property.name: tez.runtime.io.sort.mb
property.description: The size of the sort buffer when output needs to be sorted

property.name: tez.runtime.unordered.output.buffer.size-mb
property.description: The size of the buffer when output does not require to be sorted

property.name: tez.session.am.dag.submit.timeout.secs
property.description: Time to wait (in seconds) for AM to submit a DAG before timing out

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.enabled
property.description: Whether to reuse containers for tasks belonging to the same session

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.rack-fallback.enabled
property.description: Whether to fallback to rack local containers when node local containers are not available

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.non-local-fallback.enabled
property.description: Whether to fallback to non-local containers when rack local containers are not available
